verses.verse: Judge <S%G2919><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye be <S%G2919><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> judged <S%G2919><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> judgment <S%G2917><s%> ye judge <S%G2919><s%>, ye shall be judged <S%G2919><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> measure <S%G3358><s%> ye mete <S%G3354><s%>, it shall be measured <S%G488><s%> unto <S%G488><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> beholdest thou <S%G991><s%> the mote <S%G2595><s%> that is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>'s eye <S%G3788><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> considerest <S%G2657><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the beam <S%G1385><s%> that is in <S%G1722><s%> thine own <S%G4674><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%>?

Or <S%G2228><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> wilt thou say <S%G2046><s%> to <S%G80><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>, Let <S%G863><s%> me cast out <S%G1544><s%> the mote <S%G2595><s%> out <S%G575><s%> of <S%G3788><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> lo <S%G2400><s%>, the beam <S%G1385><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> thine own <S%G4675><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%>?

Thou hypocrite <S%G5273><s%>, cast out <S%G1537><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> the beam <S%G1385><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of <S%G3788><s%> thine own <S%G4675><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shalt thou see clearly <S%G1227><s%> to cast out <S%G1544><s%> the mote <S%G2595><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of <S%G3788><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>'s eye <S%G3788><s%>.

Give <S%G1325><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> that which is holy <S%G40><s%> unto the dogs <S%G2965><s%>, neither <S%G3366><s%> cast your <S%G5216><s%> pearls <S%G3135><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> the swine <S%G5519><s%>, lest <S%G3379><s%> haply they trample <S%G2662><s%> them <S%G846><s%> under <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>, and <S%G4762><s%> turn and <S%G4762><s%> rend <S%G4486><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.

Ask <S%G154><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> it shall be given <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>; seek <S%G2212><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye shall find <S%G2147><s%>; knock <S%G2925><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> it shall be opened <S%G455><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> one that asketh <S%G154><s%> receiveth <S%G2983><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he that seeketh <S%G2212><s%> findeth <S%G2147><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> to him that knocketh <S%G2925><s%> it shall be opened <S%G455><s%>.

Or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is there <S%G2076><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, who <S%G1437><s%>, if his <S%G846><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> shall ask <S%G154><s%> him <S%G846><s%> for a <S%G3361><s%> loaf <S%G1929><s%>, will give him <S%G846><s%> a <S%G3361><s%> stone <S%G3037><s%>;
or <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he shall ask <S%G154><s%> for a fish <S%G2486><s%>, will give <S%G1929><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a <S%G3361><s%> serpent <S%G3789><s%>?

If <S%G1487><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>, being <S%G5607><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%>, know how <S%G1492><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> good <S%G18><s%> gifts <S%G1390><s%> unto <S%G5043><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> children <S%G5043><s%>, how much <S%G4214><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> shall <S%G1325><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> who is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> good things <S%G18><s%> to them that <S%G3588><s%> ask <S%G154><s%> him <S%G846><s%>?

All things <S%G3956><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> ye would <S%G2309><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> men <S%G444><s%> should do <S%G4160><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, even <S%G3779><s%> so <S%G2532><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%>.

Enter ye <S%G1525><s%> in by <S%G1223><s%> the narrow gate <S%G4439><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> wide <S%G4116><s%> is the gate <S%G4439><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> broad <S%G2149><s%> is the way <S%G3598><s%>, that leadeth <S%G520><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> destruction <S%G684><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> they that enter <S%G1525><s%> in <S%G1223><s%> thereby <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> narrow <S%G2346><s%> is the gate <S%G4439><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> straitened <S%G2346><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%>, that leadeth <S%G520><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> few <S%G3641><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> they that find <S%G2147><s%> it <S%G846><s%>.

Beware <S%G4337><s%> of <S%G575><s%> false prophets <S%G5578><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%>'s clothing <S%G1742><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> inwardly <S%G2081><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> ravening <S%G727><s%> wolves <S%G3074><s%>.

By <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> fruits <S%G2590><s%> ye shall know <S%G1921><s%> them <S%G846><s%>. Do <S%G3385><s%> men gather <S%G4816><s%> grapes <S%G4718><s%> of <S%G575><s%> thorns <S%G173><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> figs <S%G4810><s%> of <S%G575><s%> thistles <S%G5146><s%>?

Even so <S%G3779><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> bringeth forth <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> the corrupt <S%G4550><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> bringeth forth <S%G4160><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%>.

A good <S%G18><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> bring forth <S%G4160><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%>, neither <S%G3761><s%> can a corrupt <S%G4550><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> bring forth <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%>.

Every <S%G3956><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> that bringeth <S%G4160><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> forth <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> is hewn down <S%G1581><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the fire <S%G4442><s%>.
Therefore <S%G686><s%> by <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> fruits <S%G2590><s%> ye shall know <S%G1921><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

Not <S%G3756><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> one that saith <S%G3004><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, shall enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> he that doeth <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> who is in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

Many <S%G4183><s%> will say <S%G2046><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, did we <S%G4395><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> prophesy <S%G4395><s%> by <S%G3686><s%> thy <S%G4674><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G3686><s%> thy <S%G4674><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> cast out <S%G1544><s%> demons <S%G1140><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G3686><s%> thy <S%G4674><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> mighty works <S%G1411><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> will I profess <S%G3670><s%> unto them <S%G3754><s%>, I <S%G1097><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>: depart <S%G672><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>, ye that work <S%G2038><s%> iniquity <S%G458><s%>.

Every <S%G3956><s%> one <S%G3748><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> that heareth <S%G191><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> of mine <S%G3450><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> doeth <S%G4160><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, shall be <S%G846><s%> likened <S%G3666><s%> unto a <S%G435><s%> wise <S%G5429><s%> man <S%G435><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> built <S%G3618><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the rock <S%G4073><s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> the rain <S%G1028><s%> descended <S%G2597><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the floods <S%G4215><s%> came <S%G2064><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the winds <S%G417><s%> blew <S%G4154><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> beat upon <S%G4363><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> house <S%G3614><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> if fell <S%G4098><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> it was founded <S%G2311><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the rock <S%G4073><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> one that heareth <S%G191><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> of mine <S%G3450><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> doeth <S%G4160><s%> them <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>, shall be likened <S%G3666><s%> unto a <S%G435><s%> foolish <S%G3474><s%> man <S%G435><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> built <S%G3618><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the sand <S%G285><s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> the rain <S%G1028><s%> descended <S%G2597><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the floods <S%G4215><s%> came <S%G2064><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the winds <S%G417><s%> blew <S%G4154><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> smote upon <S%G4350><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> house <S%G3614><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> it fell <S%G4098><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> the fall <S%G4431><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had finished <S%G4931><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> words <S%G3056><s%>, the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> were astonished <S%G1605><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> teaching <S%G1322><s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G2258><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> them <S%G846><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> one having <S%G2192><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> their scribes <S%G1122><s%>.
